meanings.definition: The state or quality of being dear or beloved.
meanings.sent1: The dearnesses of her smile always brightened his day.
meanings.sent2: The dearnesses between the siblings was evident in their laughter and hugs.
meanings.sent3: The dearnesses of his favorite toy made it hard for him to share with others.
meanings.sent4: The dearnesses of her friendship was a treasure he held close to his heart.
meanings.sent5: The dearnesses of the old photo brought back sweet memories of their youth.

meanings.definition: The high cost or expense of something.
meanings.sent1: The dearnesses of the designer handbag made it out of reach for many.
meanings.sent2: The dearnesses of living in the city often leads to budget constraints.
meanings.sent3: The dearnesses of the concert tickets left him with an empty wallet.
meanings.sent4: The dearnesses of his mistake cost him more than he could imagine.
meanings.sent5: The dearnesses of the rare gemstone made it a prized possession for collectors.
